class.name: GDScriptErrorChecker
class.brief_description: Tool to check for errors on GDScript source code.
class.description: [GDScriptErrorChecker] takes the source code of a GDScript file and runs it through the GDScript parser in order to expose any errors it finds.

method.name: get_error
method.description: Returns the message for an error at the given index.

method.name: get_error_column
method.description: Returns the column on the line the error at the given index happened.

method.name: get_error_count
method.description: Returns the number of errors the parser found.

method.name: get_error_line
method.description: Returns the line the error at the given index happened.

method.name: has_errors
method.description: Returns whether or not the parser found any errors.

method.name: set_source
method.description: Sets the source code and runs it through the parser. This is necessary for the other functions to run.
